
# scrollIntoViewIfNeeded([options])

Scrolls the element into view if needed.

| Parameter              | Type    | Default | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| ---------------------- | ------- | ------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| options                | object  | `null`  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| options.timeout        | number  | `30000` | Maximum time in milliseconds. Pass `0` to disable the timeout. Default is overridden by the `setDefaultTimeout` option on BrowserContext or Page. |

### Returns

| Type            | Description                                                     |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `Promise<void>` | A promise that resolves when the element is scrolled into view. |

### Example

```javascript
import { browser } from 'k6/browser';

export const options = {
  scenarios: {
    browser: {
      executor: 'shared-iterations',
      options: {
        browser: {
          type: 'chromium',
        },
      },
    },
  },
};

export default async function () {
  const page = await browser.newPage();
  await page.goto('https://test.k6.io');

  const element = await page.$(".header");
  await element.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded();

  await page.close();
}
```
